sourcesContent:
import './Report.css'; import React from "react"; /* This file is a component that has two fields - month and year. The initial and deductive value of these two fields is the current month and year. Also, a table of expenses is always displayed - in which the user's expenses for the current month and year are displayed. If the user's expenses have not yet been entered - the information will not be displayed in the table, and the user will be notified of this. When a user changes the month and/or year - a table is shown to him for the month and/or year he entered. */ const Report = ({ costs, reportDate, reportDateHandler }) => { return (
{costs.map((cost) => ( {" "} ))}
Item Name Description Price Amount Category Purchase Date
{cost.item_name} {cost.description} {cost.price}₪ {cost.amount} {cost.category} {new Date(cost.purchaseDate).toLocaleDateString()}
{costs.length === 0 &&
No data available
}
); }; export default Report;
